name: Vegan Jalapeno Poppers
description: These Vegan Jalapeno Poppers are creamy, spicy, easy to make and totally dairy free! Easy raspberry dipping sauce recipe included. Perfect Game Day food!
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces vegan cream cheese (homemade or store-bought*)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F.

recipeInstructions.text: Put on gloves to deal with the peppers (the spices will get on your hands and you might later burn your eye!). Slice the jalape単os in half lengthwise, then using a small spoon scoop out the membranes and seeds and discard.
recipeInstructions.name: Put on gloves to deal with the peppers (the spices will get on your hands and you might later burn your eye!). Slice the jalape単os in half lengthwise, then using a small spoon scoop out the membranes and seeds and discard.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the vegan cream cheese, garlic powder and onion powder together until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, mix the vegan cream cheese, garlic powder and onion powder together until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: In another small bowl, mix the melted vegan butter and breadcrumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: In another small bowl, mix the melted vegan butter and breadcrumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the cream cheese mixture into the jalape単os. Sprinkle with the breadcrumbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop the cream cheese mixture into the jalape単os. Sprinkle with the breadcrumbs.

recipeInstructions.text: Place on a baking sheet and bake for about 20-25 minutes, until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Place on a baking sheet and bake for about 20-25 minutes, until golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Raspberry Sauce: Add the jam and water to a bowl, and microwave for 30 seconds to 1 minute and stir.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Raspberry Sauce: Add the jam and water to a bowl, and microwave for 30 seconds to 1 minute and stir.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve jalapeno poppers with raspberry sauce for dipping. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve jalapeno poppers with raspberry sauce for dipping. Enjoy!

keywords: baked jalapeno poppers, vegan jalapeno poppers
